resources.string: This is a quadratic equation. These equations are very important in the world of Mathematics. These are one of the first type of equations all mathematicians need to learn to solve and work with. Though they may look complicated and hard - they are quite easy to solve.

What makes an equation quadratic? All quadratic equations have squared term - this means that they will have something like x2. The first expression above is a quadratic equation, so is the second one. But the second one is not. Now that you are able to spot quadratic equations you can begin to solve them...
